trait.name: Bloodthirsty
text: If 6 or more gorelings are within 30 feet of one another, they become frenzied and their attacks deal an extra 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Swarming
text: Up to five gorelings can occupy the same space.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.

reaction.name: Multiplying
text: When a goreling is hit but not reduced to 0 hp, it splits into two new gorelings. Each new goreling has 1 hp, doesn't have this reaction, and is one size smaller than the original goreling.
